invalidNodeNames: XML node names can must only contain alphanumeric characters and must begin with a letter. Please fix the following rows:
missingXmlRecordNodeName: Please enter a value for the XML record node.
missingXmlRootNodeName: Please enter a value for the XML root node.
invalidXmlRecordNodeName: Please enter a valid XML record node value.
invalidXmlRootNodeName: Please enter a valid XML root node value.
batchVars: Booleans for whether or not the current batch of results being generated is the first or last. This is only ever used for users generating the data in-page, which generates the results in chunks. For all other situations, both are always true.
colNamesArray: An ordered array of strings containing the column names.
rowDataArray: An ordered array of arrays. Each top level array contains the contents of the row; each child array contains an ordered array of values for each item of data.
